infobox.Japanese title:: 小五郎、怒りの大追跡  (Kogorō, Ikari no Dai Tsuiseki?)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Satomi Akesaka as Risa Purple  Jin Domon as Ginji Yamane  Kōichi Sakaguchi as Junichi Sakuta  Naoki Makishima as Takichi Takeyama  Hayato Nakata as Yosaburo Ihara  Aya Endo as Bianca
infobox.Opening song:: Sekai wa Anata no Iro ni Naru

sections.Situation:
It started when the idol Risa Purple was having a concert, but in fail, they kidnapped Ran as Risa Purple.


While examining the email, Conan notices that the account on Facenet may be falsified. The suspicion falls on Risa's manager Yamane who previously made contact with Takeyama as he is angry with the latter actions toward Risa. As time is running out, Kogoro decides to appeal the public through Beika News Channel in order to reach the kidnappers and plead for them to release Ran.

sections.Trivia:
- The Cheetah Delivery company reappears in the first part of this episode.
- Takichi Takeyama's pick-up truck is a 1997 Nissan Datsun Truck [D22]. The license plate number is 新宿 420, は 53-40 (Shinjuku 420, Ha 53-40).
- Facenet is a parody of Facebook.
- Bianca and Junichi Sakuta's motorcycle is a 2015 Yamaha T-Max 530 Scuderia.
- BCN is a parody of CNN.
